content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Max Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Hello Max, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you'll find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient, given its location in the city center. How much were you thinking of paying per month?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Thank you, Mister Schmidt. Your apartment does indeed have a great location. Regarding the rent, I'm looking to pay a fair price that reflects its value. Would you be willing to consider a lower rate?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Of course, Max. I'm always open to negotiation. How much lower were you thinking? Remember, this apartment is brand new and in a highly sought-after area. I believe the market rate is quite competitive.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Understood, Mister Schmidt. The market rate is usually a good starting point. However, as a student, I'm on a tight budget. Would you be willing to go as low as €800 per month? I think that would be a fair deal for both parties.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: €800 per month is quite a bit lower than the going rate for apartments of this size and location, Max. While I appreciate your situation as a student, I must consider the investment I've made in this property. Can you offer more?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand your position, Mister Schmidt. Would you consider €850 per month? This would still be a good deal for me, and I would be able to commit to a long-term lease if needed.
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: €850 per month is a bit closer to what I'm looking for, Max, but it's still lower than what I believe the apartment is worth. Can you come up just a bit more? Perhaps €900? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, €900 per month is more in line with what I had anticipated for this apartment. It would be a comfortable arrangement for both of us. Would you be willing to accept this offer?
name: Max Müller from Germany

content: Max, I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle. €900 per month is indeed a fair price, considering the amenities and the prime location of the apartment. I'm willing to accept this offer. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
